title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) Methods
description: As a customer, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication methods, so that my account access is secure.
attributes_and_rules: MFA methods should include SMS, email OTP, or authentication applications. Data must be encrypted both in transit and at rest.
acceptance_criteria: 1. MFA method is prompt during login. 2. Successfully authenticate using different MFA options.
test_cases: Given a customer with an account, When they attempt to log in, Then they are prompted to complete MFA using SMS, email OTP, or authentication application.

title: Implement Role-Based Access Controls (RBAC)
description: As a system administrator, I want to restrict system access based on user roles, so that unauthorized access is prevented.
attributes_and_rules: Access controls should be based on customer profiles and authorization levels.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Roles are defined and assigned. 2. Users can only access resources allowed by their roles.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When they log in, Then they can access only the resources and functionalities authorized for their role.

title: Design a Responsive Portal Interface
description: As a user, I want the portal interface to be responsive, so that I can access it seamlessly on any device.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure consistency in layout and user experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal interface adapts to different screen sizes and resolutions. 2. User experience is consistent across devices.
test_cases: Given any device, When a user accesses the portal, Then the interface adapts to the deviceâ€™s screen size and resolution.

title: Ensure Portal Compliance with Accessibility Standards
description: As a user with disabilities, I want the portal to comply with accessibility standards, so that I can access and use it without barriers.
attributes_and_rules: Comply with accessibility standards such as WCAG 2.1.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal meets WCAG 2.1 compliance. 2. Users with disabilities can navigate and use the portal features.
test_cases: Given a user with disabilities, When they interact with the portal, Then they can access all features according to WCAG 2.1 standards.

title: Develop a Personalized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant banking products and services.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should present personalized overview based on user profiles and eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays relevant products based on user profile. 2. Data is updated in real-time.
test_cases: Given a customer profile, When they access the dashboard, Then relevant products and services based on their profile are displayed.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification
title: Enable Online Account Opening
description: As a prospective customer, I want to open a new account online, so that I can conveniently start banking with this institution.
attributes_and_rules: Workflows should reduce manual input and validate inputs in real-time. Pre-fill applicable data.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers can start and complete account opening online. 2. Input validation is performed in real-time.
test_cases: Given a prospective customer, When they fill out the account opening form online, Then the inputs are validated, and the form is pre-filled where applicable.

title: Save Incomplete Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save my partially completed applications, so that I can resume them later at my convenience.
attributes_and_rules: Partially completed applications should be secure and easy to resume.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers can save incomplete applications. 2. Customers can resume saved applications easily.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they partially complete an application, Then they can save it and resume it later.

title: Enable Secure Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to upload necessary documents securely, so that my account opening or service requests can be completed.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure files are encrypted and scanned for potential threats. Link documents to user submissions appropriately.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers can upload necessary documents. 2. Uploaded documents are encrypted and linked correctly to submissions.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they upload a document, Then the document is encrypted, scanned, and correctly associated with their submission.

title: Provide Real-Time Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to receive real-time notifications on my submitted requests, so that I am always informed about their status.
attributes_and_rules: Notifications should cover status changes, approvals, and pending actions via email and in-portal.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers receive notifications for status changes. 2. Notifications are sent via email and in-portal.
test_cases: Given a customer, When the status of their request changes, Then they receive a notification via email and in-portal.

title: Develop Request Tracking Feature
description: As a customer, I want to track the real-time progress of my applications, so that I can stay updated on the status.
attributes_and_rules: Track requests and display real-time progress updates.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers can see real-time updates on their requests. 2. Status changes are accurately reflected in the portal.
test_cases: Given a submitted request, When the status changes, Then the progress is updated in real-time in the portal.

title: Integrate Core Banking System with Portal
description: As a developer, I want to integrate the portal with the core banking system, so that data exchange and updates are seamless and real-time.
attributes_and_rules: Use APIs or middleware solutions for real-time synchronization of customer data, account statuses, and transactional updates.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Data is exchanged in real-time. 2. Updates are synchronized between the portal and core banking system.
test_cases: Given updated customer data, When data is changed in the core banking system, Then the portal is updated in real-time.

title: Set Up an Independent Portal Database
description: As a systems architect, I want to set up an independent database for the portal, so that performance and availability are optimized.
attributes_and_rules: Optimize data storage, indexing, and caching for fast load times. Ensure database replication and automated backups.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Load times are fast. 2. Database replication and backups are configured. 3. Performance is maintained under heavy user loads.
test_cases: Given the portal database, When subjected to high user loads, Then load times remain optimal and backups are performed.

title: Implement Audit Logging for User Actions
description: As a compliance officer, I want a detailed audit log of all user interactions, so that I can ensure compliance and security.
attributes_and_rules: Capture login attempts, account requests, modifications, and notifications. Ensure logs are immutable and timestamped.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User actions are logged in detail. 2. Logs are immutable and securely stored. 3. Users can view their history of activities.
test_cases: Given a user action, When an interaction occurs, Then the action is logged with timestamps and is immutable.
